doc.title: Independent doesn't mince words in Silvio Berlusconi, Angela Merkel spat | Media Monkey
doc.author: Monkey
doc.description: Media Monkey: Independent caption writer takes literal track on Berlusconi's foul-mouthed tirade about German chancellor
doc.tags: The Independent,Newspapers & magazines,National newspapers,Newspapers,Media,Angela Merkel,World news,Silvio Berlusconi

main.p: You might think the leaders of Germany and Italy are facing enough problems as they try to rescue Europe from its debt crisis. However, just in time to brighten German leader Angela Merkel's day came the caption above from the Independent website, pointed out by Jon Slattery on his blog. The caption has now been changed – but the quote lingers on in the full article – as it no doubt will in Merkel's memory.
main.head: Independent doesn't mince words in Silvio Berlusconi, Angela Merkel spat
main.p: This article is more than 13 years old
